uid.description: Unique identifier for the phone number record.

business_uid.description: Unique identifier of the business that owns this phone number.

phone_number.description: The complete phone number in E.164 format without formatting (e.g., "12127654321"). This is the actual phone number that was purchased from the telecom provider.

country_code.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code indicating the country where the phone number is registered (e.g., "US" for United States, "CA" for Canada).

features.description: List of telephony features to enable for this phone number, (e.g., ["VOICE", "SMS"]).

status.description: Current operational status of the phone number.

verification_status.description: Indicates the outcome of verifying a phone number's ownership and validity based on business verification data provided. This field applies only to U.S. and Canadian numbers and reflects compliance verification required by telecom regulations.

verification_request_data.description: Business verification information required for text messaging compliance in the United States and Canada. This data registers your business with mobile carriers to enable SMS messaging capabilities. The verification process helps prevent spam and ensures your business messages are delivered reliably to customers.

entity_type.description: Legal form of the business. PRIVATE_PROFIT: Privately-held for-profit company (e.g., LLC, Corp). PUBLIC_PROFIT: Publicly-traded for-profit company. NON_PROFIT: Non-profit organization (e.g., 501(c)(3)). SOLE_PROPRIETOR: Individual business owner without formal business entity.

brand_name.description: Brand name of the company or DBA (Doing Business As)

street.description: Street address and number (e.g., "123 Main Street", "456 5th Avenue")

full_address.description: Complete formatted address including street, city, state, postal code, and country (e.g., "123 Main Street, New York, NY 10001, USA")

contact_phone.description: Contact phone number in E.164 format without + prefix

mobile_phone.description: Mobile phone number for brand verification in E.164 format without + prefix

created_at.description: The creation date and time of the phone number record.

updated_at.description: Updated date and time of the phone number record.

verification_request_data.full_address: 123 Business Ave, New York, NY 10001, USA

description: A business-owned phone number with enabled features and lifecycle metadata.
